Class GraalScriptRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.undercouch.citeproc.script.AbstractScriptRunner

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonBuilderFactory, ScriptRunner, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class GraalScriptRunner
extends AbstractScriptRunner
    Executes JavaScript scripts through GraalVM JavaScript

    Michel Kraemer
